fields.fieldTitle: WHO are you going to teach? (PLURAL)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: funnel hackers; real estate investors; parents of kids with ADHD; people who want to lose weight; women who want to look younger, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the #1 big, huge result they desire most in this area?

fieldHint.hint1: "My audience really wants to ________." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: create a 7-figure funnel; make a quick 10K this weekend by flipping houses on eBay; naturally destroy your kid's ADHD; reconnect with your wife; lose weight without exercising; enjoy a youthful appearance, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is one more big, huge result they desire most in this area?

fieldHint.hint1: "My audience also really wants to ________." (Starts with a VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: set up a money-making, high-tech website; discover how to REALLY make money in real estate; help your kids get better grades; find the passion in your marriage; put your body into a fat burning state of "ketosis"; get rid of lines and wrinkles, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's the #1 big thing they are most AFRAID of in this area?

fieldHint.hint1: "My audience is really SCARED of ________." (VERB ending in "ING".)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: having to hire an expensive tech guy; getting a loan from a bank; giving up their favorite after-school snacks; having to go through painful counseling; giving up your favorite carbs; getting injections of Botox or other harsh chemicals, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's one more big thing they are most AFRAID of in this area?

fieldHint.hint1: "My audience also really SCARED of ________." (VERB ending in "ING")

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: being held hostage by your shopping cart; dealing with psychotic sellers; crying fits or chaos in your home; wasting time talking; eating only rabbit food for the rest of your life; having dangerous surgery, etc,

fields.fieldTitle: What time frame can you help them get results?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: less than 30 minutes; no time flat; a single weekend; 1 week, etc.
